Desc.eng: Hey, traveler! Our families are starving!
I wonder why this feels like deja vu?
What are you mumbling there, son? We ran out of food two days ago and the volunteers we sent to the storehouse never returned.
For a starving man in need you are really insolent. Why should I help you?
Maybe because I have a vital piece of information about what you seek. Bring us some food supplies. You help me, I help you.
I will get your supplies. But if you try to trick me...
Your offer is way too vague, find other volunteers.
Isn't that a sausage in your hand?
Oh, this is just the emergency rations! It only makes me hungrier.
